snippet: The number of foreign students has doubled at many state universities, as officials embrace "gold rush" mentality.
abstract: The number of foreign students has doubled at many state universities, as officials embrace "gold rush" mentality.
lead_paragraph: Foreign students at some of America's state universities are footing the bill for low-income Americans, a recent article in The New York Times says.

headline.main: American Universities Woo High-Paying Foreign Students
